library(LearnBayes)
data("birthweight")
library(lattice)
mygender <- with(birthweight, ifelse(birthweight$gender==0,"Male","Female"))
dotplot(mygender ~ weight, data = birthweight,
xlab = "Birthweight", ylab = "Gender")
